 CxList location = All.FindByMemberAccess("Location.get*");
CxList XSS_GWT_Output = GWT_XSS_Outputs();
CxList sanitize = All.FindByName("*encode*", false);

result = All.FindXSS(location, XSS_GWT_Output, sanitize);
